languages.text: {n}Монтэг гневно кривится.{/n} "Все мы почувствовали каждый миг агонии святого Ангела. А потом он умер, и с ним умерла наша мечта. Ты затушил{mf||а} ее, а после растоптал{mf||а}, как брошенный окурок. Его песнь не вернется в наши сны, Многорукий Император не увидит нас".

{n}Einrich winces angrily.{/n} "We all felt every single moment of the blessed angel's agony. And then he died, and our dream died with him. You snuffed it out and stomped on it like a lho-stick butt. Now, his song will not return to our dreams. The Many-Armed Emperor will not see us."
languages.original_text: {n}Монтэг гневно кривится.{/n} "Все мы почувствовали каждый миг агонии святого Ангела. А потом он умер, и с ним умерла наша мечта. Ты затушил{mf||а} ее, а после растоптал{mf||а}, как брошенный окурок. Его песнь не вернется в наши сны, Многорукий Император не увидит нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Monteg winces angrily.{/n} "Each of us felt every moment of the blessed Angel's agony. And then he died, and our dream died with him. You snuffed it out and then stomped on it as if it was a cigarette butt. His song will not return to our dreams, the Emperor-in- the-Void will not see us."

{n}Einrich winces angrily.{/n} "We all felt every single moment of the blessed angel's agony. And then he died, and our dream died with him. You snuffed it out and stomped on it like a lho-stick butt. Now, his song will not return to our dreams. The Many-Armed Emperor will not see us."

languages.text: {n}Einrich hace una mueca de dolor y furia.{/n} «Todos sentimos cada momento de la agonía del ángel bendito. Y entonces murió, llevándose con él nuestro sueño. Lo has extinguido y pisoteado como una colilla de lho. Ahora no escuchamos su canto en sueños. El Emperador de Múltiples Brazos no nos reconocerá».
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich winces angrily.{/n} "We all felt every single moment of the blessed angel's agony. And then he died, and our dream died with him. You snuffed it out and stomped on it like a lho-stick butt. Now, his song will not return to our dreams. The Many-Armed Emperor will not see us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich hace una mueca de dolor y furia.{/n} «Todos sentimos cada momento de la agonía del ángel bendito. Y entonces murió, llevándose con él nuestro sueño. Lo has extinguido y pisoteado como una colilla de lho. Ahora no escuchamos su canto en sueños. El Emperador de Múltiples Brazos no nos reconocerá».

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒが怒りに震える。{/n}「我々は、祝福された天使の苦悩を1秒ごとに感じていた。そして彼は死に、私たちの夢も彼とともに死んだ。あなたはアイホスティックにするように、それを消し去り、踏みにじったのです。もう、彼の歌が私たちの夢に出ることはない。多腕の皇帝が私たちを見守ることはない」
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich winces angrily.{/n} "We all felt every single moment of the blessed angel's agony. And then he died, and our dream died with him. You snuffed it out and stomped on it like a lho-stick butt. Now, his song will not return to our dreams. The Many-Armed Emperor will not see us."

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒが怒りに震える。{/n}「我々は、祝福された天使の苦悩を1秒ごとに感じていた。そして彼は死に、私たちの夢も彼とともに死んだ。あなたはアイホスティックにするように、それを消し去り、踏みにじったのです。もう、彼の歌が私たちの夢に出ることはない。多腕の皇帝が私たちを見守ることはない」

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇愤怒地畏缩着。{/n}“我们每时每刻都能感受到天使的痛苦。如今他死了，我们的梦想也随之破灭了。是你掐灭了我们的梦想，像踩麻烟烟头一样把它踩灭了。如今，他的歌声再也不会出现在我们的梦境之中，四臂神皇也再也看不到我们了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich winces angrily.{/n} "We all felt every single moment of the blessed angel's agony. And then he died, and our dream died with him. You snuffed it out and stomped on it like a lho-stick butt. Now, his song will not return to our dreams. The Many-Armed Emperor will not see us."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇愤怒地畏缩着。{/n}“我们每时每刻都能感受到天使的痛苦。如今他死了，我们的梦想也随之破灭了。是你掐灭了我们的梦想，像踩麻烟烟头一样把它踩灭了。如今，他的歌声再也不会出现在我们的梦境之中，四臂神皇也再也看不到我们了。”

languages.text: {n}Einrich verzieht zornig das Gesicht.{/n} "Wir alle haben jeden einzelnen Augenblick der Qualen des gesegneten Engels gespürt. Und dann ist er gestorben, und unser Traum mit ihm. Ihr habt ihn ausgelöscht und zertreten wie eine Lho-Kippe. Nun wird sein Lied nicht mehr in unsere Träume zurückkehren. Der vielarmige Imperator wird uns nicht sehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich winces angrily.{/n} "We all felt every single moment of the blessed angel's agony. And then he died, and our dream died with him. You snuffed it out and stomped on it like a lho-stick butt. Now, his song will not return to our dreams. The Many-Armed Emperor will not see us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich verzieht zornig das Gesicht.{/n} "Wir alle haben jeden einzelnen Augenblick der Qualen des gesegneten Engels gespürt. Und dann ist er gestorben, und unser Traum mit ihm. Ihr habt ihn ausgelöscht und zertreten wie eine Lho-Kippe. Nun wird sein Lied nicht mehr in unsere Träume zurückkehren. Der vielarmige Imperator wird uns nicht sehen."

languages.text: {n}Einrich grimace de colère.{/n} « Chacun d'entre nous a ressenti l'agonie de l'ange béni, et ce, jusqu'à son dernier souffle. Quand il est mort, notre rêve est mort avec lui. Vous l'avez étouffé, et même piétiné comme un mégot de cigalho. Désormais, nous n'entendrons plus son chant dans notre sommeil. L'Empereur aux mille bras ne nous verra pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich winces angrily.{/n} "We all felt every single moment of the blessed angel's agony. And then he died, and our dream died with him. You snuffed it out and stomped on it like a lho-stick butt. Now, his song will not return to our dreams. The Many-Armed Emperor will not see us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich grimace de colère.{/n} « Chacun d'entre nous a ressenti l'agonie de l'ange béni, et ce, jusqu'à son dernier souffle. Quand il est mort, notre rêve est mort avec lui. Vous l'avez étouffé, et même piétiné comme un mégot de cigalho. Désormais, nous n'entendrons plus son chant dans notre sommeil. L'Empereur aux mille bras ne nous verra pas. »

languages.text: {n}Einrich öfkeyle irkiliyor.{/n} "Kutsanmış meleğin ızdırabının her bir anını hepimiz hissettik. Öldüğünde hayalimiz de onunla birlikte öldü. Onu söndürüp liho dalı izmariti gibi üzerine bastın. Artık şarkısı, rüyalarımıza geri dönmeyecek. Çok Kollu İmparator bizi görmeyecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich winces angrily.{/n} "We all felt every single moment of the blessed angel's agony. And then he died, and our dream died with him. You snuffed it out and stomped on it like a lho-stick butt. Now, his song will not return to our dreams. The Many-Armed Emperor will not see us."
